items.sentence: I just got a letter from someone that I knew a long time ago.
If you know what needs to be done, please go ahead and do it.
It irritates Tom when Mary leaves the cap off the toothpaste.
I can\'t believe that Tom was able to do this all by himself.
Tom wanted Mary to understand why he couldn\'t live with her.
Tom wanted to ask a question, but thought that he shouldn\'t.
Tom wanted to go to Boston, but his father wouldn\'t let him.
Tom said he wanted me to spend the summer in Boston with him.
Tom said he wanted to be alone, and then went up to his room.
In Japan, people legally become adults when they turn twenty.
It never occurred to me that he might be an escaped prisoner.
Mary felt happy when she learned the results of the election.
Thank you for preparing meals for me while I was sick in bed.
Tom could probably never convince Mary to try bungee jumping.
Tom discovered that Mary was in trouble and went to help her.
I doubt that our new boss will be any worse than the old one.
That\'s something we should probably take care of right away.
Tom had to push his bicycle today because it had a flat tire.
Tom says he might dye his goatee red and green for Christmas.
Tom wants desperately to believe that what Mary said is true.
